    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109879</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109879</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Exocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Exocytosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exocytosis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the removal of secretory products like enzymes from a secretory cell through exocytosis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enzymes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exocytosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Golgi apparatus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">secretory vesicles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Abbau der 
ausscheidenden Produkte wie Enzyme von einer ausscheidenden Zelle 
durch exocytosis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre le déplacement des 
produits sécréteurs comme des enzymes d'une cellule sécréteuse par
l'exocytosis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra a remoção de 
produtos secretory como enzymes de uma pilha secretory com o 
exocytosis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra la rimozione dei 
prodotti secretivi come gli enzimi da una cellula secretiva con il 
exocytosis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει την αφαίρεση των 
εκκριτικών προϊόντων όπως τα ένζυμα από ένα εκκριτικό κύτταρο
μέσω exocytosis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra el retiro de 
productos secretores como las enzimas de una célula secretora con 
exocytosis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">exocytosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Golgi Apparat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exocytosis</string>
          </keyword>
